name: Deadly Unions
description:
Deadly Unions is a sci-fi side-scroller shooter with the object of the game being to kill all enemies. The trouble with aliens is that sometimes they work together and make it harder to kill them. This game gives an retro classic side-scrolling shooter  feel combined with some recently seen game mechanics like ledge climbing and dodge rolling.  It's a good mix of sci-fi horror and lot of fun. I created this game for GMTK Game Jam 2021. 

I hope you enjoy the game!
